segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running right over the edge, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the drain is clogged or if she forgot to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t slipped yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be so slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what’s happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are about to cause more trouble, and she’s oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly if she doesn’t turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
